instruction.value: Administer in the morning and evening for 3 consectutive days.

AdditionalNotes.value: Adults and children over 2 years. Recommend retreatment after 2 and 4 weeks. Enterobius re-infection is known to be very frequent.

Adults and children over years. Recommended for Trichuriasis, Ascariasis, Ankylstomiasis, Strongyloidisasis, Taeniasis, and mixed infections. A second treatment course is advised if not cured 3 weeks after treatment.
